name: APEX QR Code Scanner
description:
This Region Plug-in is used to scan QR-Codes, Barcodes and others. If any string has been detected an APEX Item can be set, Dynamic Action can be fired or JavaScript can be executed. The following formats are supported: QR_CODE, AZTEC, CODABAR, CODE_39, CODE_93, CODE_128, DATA_MATRIX, MAXICODE, ITF, EAN_13, EAN_8, PDF_417, RSS_14, RSS_EXPANDED, UPC_A, UPC_E, UPC_EAN_EXTENSION.

Important clarification: My work in the development team of Oracle APEX is in no way related to my open source projects or the plug-ins here on apex.world! All plug-ins are built in my spare time and are not supported by Oracle!
